General.Name: Guangdong Fangyuan Environment Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Guangdong Fangyuan New Materials Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of nickel and lithium battery cathode materials. The company offers nickel hyrogen battery cathode materials, battery grade cobalt sulfate crystals, and battery grade manganese sulphates, as well as NCM and NCA precursors. Its products are used in energy vehicle power batteries, power tools, energy storage equipment, and electronic products. The company was formerly known as Jiangmen Fangyuan Environmental Technology Development Co Ltd. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Jiangmen, China.
General.Address: No. 11, Area A, Lingang Industrial Park, Jiangmen, China, 529145
